articles.author: Mike Ives
articles.title: Your Tuesday Briefing
articles.description: BBC, India, France: Here’s what you need to know.
articles.content:
Edward Wong, our former Beijing bureau chief who now covers U.S. foreign policy, wrote the story with Julian Barnes, who covers intelligence and national security. Edward responded by email.
Can you say anything about how you got the story?
I first heard ab… [+1978 chars]

articles.author: Neil Vigdor
articles.title: Drew Brees Dethrones Peyton Manning as the N.F.L. Touchdown King
articles.description: Brees threw four touchdown passes on Monday to surpass Manning’s career record by two TDs. In a Saints rout of the Colts, Brees also broke the league’s single-game record for completion percentage.
articles.content:
New Englands Tom Brady, who has 538 career touchdowns and six Super Bowl rings, tweeted his congratulations to Brees and said he looked forward to trying to eclipse his record.
Brees, 40, has been putting up gaudy statistics after missing five games early in… [+443 chars]

articles.author: Mariel Padilla
articles.title: Executions and Support for the Death Penalty Remain Low, Report Finds
articles.description: States carried out 22 executions this year, the Death Penalty Information Center said.
articles.content:
More than 90 percent of this years executions were carried out in the South: Texas had nine; Alabama, Georgia and Tennessee each had three; Florida two; and Missouri and South Dakota each had one. 
Thirty-two states have abolished the death penalty or not ca… [+1511 chars]

articles.author: Dennis Overbye
articles.title: Europe’s Cheops Satellite Will Scour Space for Habitable Planets
articles.description: Follow the launch of the world’s newest orbiting telescope.
articles.content:
The European Space Agency is continuing the search for new Earths this week with the launch of Cheops, a new telescope whose name stands for CHaracterising ExOPlanet Satellite.
Cheops is scheduled to launch on a Soyuz-Fregat rocket from the European spacepor… [+540 chars]

articles.author: Kenneth P. Vogel
articles.title: Giuliani Provides Details of What Trump Knew About Ambassador’s Removal
articles.description: Rudolph Giuliani said in an interview that he briefed the president “a couple of times” about Marie Yovanovitch, the envoy to Ukraine, setting her recall in motion.
articles.content: Ms. Yovanovitch, a 33-year veteran of the Foreign Service, testified in the impeachment proceedings that Mr. Giuliani helped lead a smear campaign against her based on what she described as scurrilous lies, and she described the State Department as capitulati… [+1852 chars]
